body:
## ðŸ“‹ Task

### Description
Implement complete CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for course management following Clean Architecture principles.

### Implementation Checklist

#### Domain Layer
- [x] Course entity created
- [ ] Course value objects (CourseCode, Credits)
- [ ] Course business rules validation
- [ ] Course domain events

#### Application Layer
- [ ] Create Course command and handler
- [ ] Update Course command and handler
- [ ] Delete Course command and handler
- [ ] Get Course query and handler
- [ ] Get Courses list query and handler
- [ ] Course DTOs and mapping profiles
- [ ] Validation rules with FluentValidation

#### Infrastructure Layer
- [ ] Course repository implementation
- [ ] Course entity configuration
- [ ] Course migrations
- [ ] Course seed data

#### API Layer
- [ ] CoursesController implementation
- [ ] API endpoints (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
- [ ] Request/Response models
- [ ] API documentation

#### Testing
- [ ] Unit tests for commands and queries
- [ ] Integration tests for API endpoints
- [ ] Repository unit tests

### Technical Notes
- Follow CQRS pattern with MediatR
- Use Repository + Unit of Work pattern
- Implement proper error handling
- Add logging with structured logging
- Use AutoMapper for DTO mapping

### Definition of Done
- All CRUD operations working
- Unit tests passing (>90% coverage)
- API documentation updated
- Code review completed

### Estimated Effort
2-3 days
